titleStmt.title: Aristotle's master-piece, or, The secrets of generation displayed in all the parts thereof ... very necessary for all midwives, nurses, and young-married women.
titleStmt.author: Aristotle, pseud.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W.B. and are to be sold by most booksellers in London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
